body_html:
Great, SGTM. No strong opinions here wrt GPUOptions vs other locations; if it's in GPUOptions it may make sense to change the comment in the ConfigProto GPUOptions field to reflect that GPUOptions are not only per-GPU settings.

Thanks! Please ping me / close this issue when this is merged. It will be very helpful for the work I am doing right now.

body:
Great, SGTM. No strong opinions here wrt GPUOptions vs other locations; if it's in GPUOptions it may make sense to change the comment in the ConfigProto GPUOptions field to reflect that GPUOptions are not only per-GPU settings.

Thanks! Please ping me / close this issue when this is merged. It will be very helpful for the work I am doing right now.
